context.title: XMLValidator
context.description: XML Validator Node (Supportpac IA9A) Validates an XML message against an XML schema
Properties navigator Displays the node properties. You configure the node by selecting the properties and setting their values. Mandatory properties are marked with an asterisk.
Basic page You can set schema locations to override those contained in messages being processed. Enable other options as desired
Advanced Page Configure additional logging for the XMLValidator node
